name: trump-s-favourite-insults-on-twitter
title: Trump's favourite insults on Twitter
description: List of words used as insults by Donald Trump on Twitter. I scraped the data from the NYT interactive page showing all the people, places and things Trump has insulted since announcing his candidacy last June. Then I used a word counter to see the frequency of each insult. The dataset is now cleaned and good for vis.

resources.name: Trump's favourite insults on Twitter
resources.description: List of words used as insults by Donald Trump on Twitter. I scraped the data from the NYT interactive page showing all the people, places and things Trump has insulted since announcing his candidacy last June. The NYT page has direct links to the tweets, but I just wanted to analyse the words. The categorisation of insults is loosely based, so feel free to recategorise as you see fit. I wanted to visualise the amount of insults Trump used to see which ones he most often turned to.
